Marcus GohLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 18 Jun 2018If fundamentals never changed, investor will "Average Down" by accumulating more shares at a low price. That's the principles of value investing of buying low and selling high when the price get back to it's fair value. ​It's kind of personal as Investing is 80% psychology and 20% strategy. You have to control your emotions. Don't let emotion cloud your judgement.​Warren Buffet quote, "if you are not willing to own a stock for 10 years, do not even think about owning it for 10 minutes."​I hope I have helped you in this post, all the best and godspeed! ​0 comments2
